["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Debian 安装镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"需要安装 Debian 时，如果需要网络安装介质，下载以下链接"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/current/amd64/iso-cd/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["中以 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"amd64-netinst.iso"}]," 结尾的文件即可。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如果需要离线安装桌面环境，在"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/current-live/amd64/iso-hybrid/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["中可以选择不同桌面的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"debian-live-xxx-amd64-xxx.iso"}]," 文件，如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"debian-live-12.1.0-amd64-lxqt.iso"}]," 的文件中
就包含了离线安装 12.1.0 amd64 架构 lxqt 桌面的 Debian 所需的内容。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Debian CD 镜像使用帮助
